main.bio: Oliver is senior at Ashesi University majoring in Computer Science. Hopefully, he will graduating in summer 2018. During summer 2016, he interned as a software developer for iSpace Foundation, where he worked on a project meant to hub dataset about Ghana. His Computer Science interests include artificial intelligence,distributed systems, mobile and web application development

education.description: Ashesi's Computer Science programme focuses not only on software design and programming, but also on empowering young people to be at the forefront of African growth by harnessing the power of technology.

work.title: Facebook Developer Circle Accra, Co-Lead
work.description: Developer Circles is a community-driven program that's free to join and open to coders, programmers, Software Developers, students, etc. Each Developer Circle is led by members of the local community who act as leads for the circle, organizing events offline and managing a local online Facebook community.  Developer Circles are forums to share knowledge, collaborate, build new ideas, and learn about the latest technologies from Facebook and other industry leaders.  As a Co-Lead,  he coordinates with Facebook on promoting the ecosystem of technology in Ghana, organize technology events like Meetups, Hackathons, train other developers on Facebook Technologies like React, React Native, etc
